typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		datetime as string,
		product_id as short,
		shop_id as short,
		qnty as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['data/**/dbo.arrivals.csv']) ~> Arrivals
source(output(
		id as short,
		datetime as string,
		product_id as short,
		shop_id as boolean,
		qnty as short,
		price as double,
		cost as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['data/**/dbo.sales.csv']) ~> Sales
Sales, Arrivals join(Sales@product_id == Arrivals@product_id,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Arrivals sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
